text: James Emil Coco (March 21, 1930 â€“ February 25, 1987) was an American stage and screen actor. He was the recipient of a Primetime Emmy Awards and three Obie Award as well as Tony Award, and two Golden Globe Awards Coco is remembered for his supporting roles in the films Man of La Mancha in 1972 and Only When I Laugh (1981) == References == == Other websites == * * * * * * Category:1930 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Drama Desk Award winners
